title: Chai Tea Masterclass-(VEGAN Friendly)
address: Jaipur, India· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 30 mins · Hosted in English
act_int: ✅ Anyone can make Chai (Even a BEGINNER)✅VEGAN Friendly⭐ONLY Cooking Class from INDIA Recommended by BuzzFeed & Tasty⭐✅This Experience is GREAT for TEAM-BUILDING to reconnect with your colleagues while working from home. Book a private experience for your group. I can host groups over 900 guests.✅ I have host teams from Google, Amazon, Tesla, Apple, General mills, instagram, schools & University ⭐ONLY INDIAN EXPERIENCE with 100% 5⭐Are you tried of making pre mix chai tea ? & always wanted to learn authentic Chai? or you are missing that Indian Street Chai?, than your wait is overIn this experience I will share my family recipe of Masala Chai. we will make chai from the scratchLearn about⬇ History of chaiHow tea got popular in IndiaHow the concept of Masala chai was bornUses and flavors of SpicesHow to brew that perfect cup of chaiBy the end you will have authentic chai and better understand about its background, its cultural aspect and a friend in India :)✅This Experience is GREAT for Schools & University students groupsCheck my Top RATED Experience on Airbnb Samosa & Coriander Chutney(https://www.airbnb.co.in/experiences/1694352✅ I can customize menu for groups and Private bookings NOTETickets are per person, not per Screen
about_author: I'm Jd a true Delhi-ite . My family have a restaurant since 3 generations (since 1956). I grew up in a big, Punjabi family that was always eating or planning the next meal. Every holiday meant hours around the table. Cooking and eating together was how I learned to show love and to share happiness. Eating and Sharing my cuisine and making connections with people that I love the most, this love took to start cooking classes and food tours.I've been organizing  cooking classes and food tours in Delhi for past 6 years. Since last year I have started online cooking classes live from my Kitchen in Delhi, so far I have hosted more than 4k+ guest's from all over the world and hosted many big events for companies like Google, Apple, Youtube, Amazon, Pinterest, Instagram, Netgear, Toast, etc.

title: K-pop dance class with K-pop choreographers
address: 서울특별시, South Korea· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in Korean and English
act_int: Welcome to the world of K-pop dance!Wherever you are in the world, get connected online and enjoy K-pop dance with a professional choreographer. You and people from all over the world will get together online and learn K-pop choreography that make K-pop stars shine. In this 60-minute virtual session, we're going to learn and complete the highlight dance of the song, and be a K-pop stars for a while! By the end of this session, you'll find yourself enjoying dancing. Also, burn about 500 calories through K-pop dance for 1 hour and regain your health!This experience is open to anyone and everyone. I welcome people of all ages, backgrounds, and skill levels, as long as you enjoy dancing. Whether you are single, a couple or part of a group (friends, family, work colleagues), this experience will be the perfect 60 minutes whatever the occasion. CLASS INFO▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀✔Dates are based on Korean standard time.✔This experience is provided live, not recorded.✔Price is for 1 person, not for screen.  Send me a request if your preferred time is not available and if you want a team building with more than 30 people, please send me a message.
about_author: I am a professional choreographer who worked as a choreographer at Korea's top dance studio 1 Million Dance Studio. I've toured 39 countries and 69 cities for dance workshops, judging of competitions, or participating in TV or radio shows. And I worked with K-pop artists such as Luhan, Jay Park, The Boyz, Mommy Son, Playback, Lim Jisoo, and KAACHI. Now experience it yourself through online experience!

title: Tango Intro by Argentinian Experts
address: Caba, Argentina· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English, Spanish, French, and Portuguese
act_int: Visit Buenos Aires from your living room to experience Argentine TANGO!*Ask for company events and corporate gifts. We have super nice and flexible options*In this experience you’ll have at your disposal a professional tango dancer from Buenos Aires, and an expert on Latin American criminology, dance partner.You’re not only going to move your body, but you’ll also do so within the cultural and historic framework that is key to understanding the message behind this powerful dance.No previous dance experience is necessary. Even being a complete beginner, you will finally perform a professional tango step!This experience is designed for 2 guests working together. Our classes have usually only a few couples because it is a detailed experience. However, if you prefer an exclusive atmosphere, you can also reserve a private group class.If you’re alone and you wish to take a tango class, we can offer you a private single technique lesson. Contact us!When you finish the class, we have a special “gift” for you so that you can keep practicing on your own.We have a live experience in Buenos Aires too! https://es.airbnb.com/experiences/53967?s=67&sharer_id=36429032&unique_share_id=f4d8c9af-c200-407d-8036-57dd8a7c090eSo serve yourself your favorite drink, relax and enter into the cadence of this passion!
about_author: My name is Luciana and I was born and raised in Buenos Aires. My love for tango began as a little girl, so I’ve been dancing for 28 years and teaching for 24. I’ve given classes in Europe and in different countries around Latin America, but my studio, my home and my heart will always be in Argentina: the world capital of Tango.Students come from all over the globe to take classes at our studio, Divino Abasto Tango: https://instagram.com/divinoabastotango. In our dance studio the 70 members of the London Symphonic Orchestra took their very first steps. We have been proud to welcome youth Olympic athletes and to host the opening night for participants of the G20 Summit.Tango is a mix of sadness and sensuality. My partner, Gustavo, give us a historical and social look at this powerful experience.Let’s embark on this journey together!!!

title: Dance Salsa and Latin Music From Scratch
address: Bogotá, Colombia· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in Spanish and English
act_int: YOUR HELP COUNTS: By booking this experience, you help to sustain 17 jobs for dancers in Bogotá during the pandemic and to deliver 5 monthly dance training scholarships for low-income children.Learn FROM SCRATCH the basic steps of Colombian-style Salsa and other Latin rhythms (Merengue, Bachata, Vallenato) in this one-hour class that will guide you from scratch and help you to survive yourself on the dance floor even if you have never before danced latin music. Meet my collection of musical instruments as we discover new rhythms and discover some curiosities of Latin music. If you already have experience dancing, I will adjust to your level so that the result is impressive. I have perfected my sound and video system so that you always have clear sound of voice and music, plus a clear view of all movements. Also before starting I will show you from my window the beauty of my city Bogotá. Choose from A or B pool and find an ending surprise. This experience is great for work teams. Book a private experience for your group. Is your group larger than the maximum defined for private groups? Send me a message.Other highlightsWe recommend projecting and amplifying this experience on a big screen and having 2 square meters (6 ft)to dance.High and flexible availability. Fast answer to your chat or request. Customization for celebrations, dates and corporate events avaiable for no extra cost.
about_author: My name is Germán David, I started to dance Salsa and other Latin rhythms totally from scratch in 2010. In 2013 I started teaching Salsa at the University of Alabama and since then I have specialized in teaching people with little or no previous experience with music to dance. latin. My teaching style is based on the use of humor and everyday situations so that you learn to dance faster than you imagine, even if it is your first time. After 4 years guiding The Bogota Salsa Tour (closed due to a pandemic in 2029), I am now CEO of the TuBaile.com school with a presence in the 4 main cities. My work helps at least 25 families of teachers and employees of the company.They call me the yellow pages of dance because I know almost all the places where people dance in Bogotá, hundreds of dancers, schools and events.

title: Cuban Salsa Dance Class and Latin Party
address: Puerto Vallarta, Mexico· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 75 mins · Hosted in English, Spanish, French, and Portuguese
act_int: Enter the vibrant Latin night scene in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, from the commodity of your home through a 70 minutes workshop.You will learn the basic, steps, some easy turns and moves to rock at the dance floor. We will adapt the class to individuals, couples or groups. If you are already familiar with the basics, you can book a private class where we will teach you some more complex turns and moves. We will include some backgrounds on the cultural story of Salsa and tools to help you practice after this experience. This is a Latin Party, so we will end the session by sharing some fun moments, and yes, we will make an online toast with a coffee or a mojito, depending on what time of the day it is for you.Follow us on our IG, FB or Tw at @ alalibrepvor follow my personal account on IG, FB, Tw or Tktok at @iandalon
about_author: I am Israel and I live in Puerto Vallarta, a charming beach city in Mexico.  I love to dance Cuban salsa, Argentinean tango, jazz dance, modern dance, hip hop, etc. I have been a Salsa dance teacher for over 20 years and I have won some Cuban rueda de casino and salsa shines contests. I have taught dance in countries such as India and Brazil. My experience includes 1 year of teaching Cardio Dance and Salsa online.  I am an Airbnb Experiences Community Leader in Puerto Vallarta andI am fluent in Spanish and English, and I have a fair good French and Portuguese. I love meeting people and through this experience learn something from their culture.For this experience I use the help of one of the women in my team: Carmen, Arely, Cassandra, Anastasiya, Edith or Francia. They are all excellent dancers with their own styles.

title: Dance with a Jamaican
address: Negril, Jamaica· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English
act_int: Welcome to mi experience and to Jamaica!  I've personally been dancing since I was a kid, doing ska, bogle & more dances with my grandparents. I truly believe dancing is a celebration of your body and a connection to your soul. Yea mon, it well good fi yuh!Here's the structure of my class. We'll start with a warm-up for 5 minutes as we get to know each other a bit. Then we'll get into the hardcore dancing. I'll show you the old and new Jamaican dances. We'll do that for 30 mins then warm down for 10 minutes. I'll also share some history about Jamaica. You'll also have the chance to win Jamaican recipes or a pdf copy of my children's book.  It will be so much fun, sweat and overall, happiness. If you want to book a time you don't see here, let me know. Feel free to do several classes and bring your family and friends. The more, the merrier :) I am looking forward to having an irie time with you!I can also tailor my class for children. Groups are welcomed! If you're a couple, I can have it spiced up for you. Join me for any celebration - birthdays, get-togethers, valentines, company events and I'll add that special touch.  I can work with your team to tweak this experience to suit your event
about_author: I am pretty passionate about my country and culture and love sharing the joy of my cultural experiences with others. I am a proud Jamaican who currently creates Jamaican-themed experiences, products, content and hope to launch the social leg where we'll create farms in the inner-cities. I believe in being the change I seek I've done dancing on different beaches, hiking the Blue Mountain Peak, Calabash, bamboo rafting & so much more! Other than traveling, dancing & people, I love writing. I've self-published a couple of children's books -"Back to Basics: Dancehall ABC", "Irie the Caterpillar", "Irie the Butterfly" and more. Move and groove like a Jamaican with me.You can check out my Etsy store where I have mainly Jamaican-themed products- t-shirts, ludo board, art, natural soaps, herb and more - https://www.etsy.com/shop/IrieMekkings

title: Spiced Drinks with Dancing Indian Chef
address: Berlin, Germany· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English
act_int: !! Alcohol versions of the Drinks are available!!Make healthy, aromatic and delicious drinks right at home using spices. You will learn to create an amazing array of drinks that stimulate all your senses and style your drinks.Enjoyed by the teams of Facebook, Amazon, Yelp, Bain & Company, Salesforce, Feeding America and Leedfeeder. We will dance throughout the event so to make it a whole package and a lot of fun.The event is Great for Groups and Teambuilding (you can request a date and time at your convenience). You can choose up to 3 drinks: 1. Golden Ginger Ale with Turmeric (Experience the blasting ginger notes with the golden colour of turmeric) 2. Sweet Lassi (The drink that goes best with everything on the Indian menu.3.  Cumin ale (Best of cumin used to make an aromatic, delicious and healthy drink.)4. Hot turmeric latte (the Indian wisdom of turmeric poured in   a cup) 5. Nuts got stained ( Nut-based with hints of saffron)6. Spiced Lemonade (tangy, sweet and sour - all in one)7. Savoury Lassi (Super refreshing drink)8. Spicy Coca Cola (you will never go back to the old Coca Cola)9. Masala Chai (Spice flavoured Tea)10. Spiced Cucumber Punch (Blast of flavours in your mouth).  All kinds of customizations are possible for you.
about_author: I am Nistha, the founder of The Kitty Party in Berlin which organizes food & cultural events. I come from the north of India where I learned the skills to use spices from my mother & grandma. I am a regular reader & blogger. Spices are fascinating to me.My passion is to simplify Indian cooking & its ingredients. I am distilling all my knowledge in a format that is going to be fun, engaging & widely useful. Over the last 7 years, I  have hosted countless events across countries for individuals, families, teams for MIT, Goggle, Amazon, Facebook, LinkedIn, Yelp,  Capital one, HP, Allbirds, WWP, Expedia, Coinbase, Govt. of Korea, KLA, Lyft, Iconosquare, Care.com, Unv. of Georgetown, Unv. of San Diego, Merck Grp, progressive insurance, Delivery hero & many more.  you can connect with me on Instagram:kittyparty_spiceitup or www.kittyparty

title: Flamenco Class&Party with Spanish Dancer
address: Sevilla, Spain· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English and Spanish
act_int: A VIRTUAL TRAVEL to Experience a Unique FLAMENCO Dance PARTY-CLASS in SEVILLE, Spain with EVA de TRIANA, Expert on Complete BEGINNERS. Immerse yourself in Flamenco Culture through this online experience at home. In November/December, we´ll recreate the lesson in a typical Flamenco Christmas Party with flamenco carrols, a special set and our flamenco wishes for the next yearThis Experience´s GREAT for CORPORATE OR PRIVATE EVENTS. Book a private experience for your group. Linkedin Team, Red Bull or Google Team 's successfully enjoyed it. Send me a messageWe’ll briefly introduce ourselves  After a brief intro to flamenco's origins & culture, we'll break it all into pieces, from basic body positions to footwork, flamenco rhythms to basic arms-hands work and clappings. Once you’re feeling comfortable with them, you´ll be ready to dance a brief fun flamenco workout. At the end, we´ll chatTo enjoy it to the fullest, check your WIFI and dress up. Women: A flattered skirt/dress with comfortable shoes. Medium-heeled shoes or sneakers (any platforms shoes or sandals), a shawl or a flower on your hair. Men: Dress shoes or sport ones and a vest. Barefood is possibleAfterwards, you'll receive an email including the songs, a video of the workout done & more resourcesCheck my online&offline reviews airbnb.es/experiences/115207Say hi on @ishowusevilla Insta, Face , YouTubeChannel
about_author: I'm Eva Izquierdo de Triana, the Online Flamenco Queen ;) , teacher, host  and founder, of IShowU Sevilla, Unique Flamenco Experiences. I've breathed flamenco my whole life because I was born in Triana, one of Seville's most emblematic flamenco neighbourhoods. As a flamenco dancer, singer, teacher and host, I love sharing this art with anyone who wants to immerse themselves in this unique culture. I've been teaching beginners for the last ten years and am 100% local, so you'll learn to understand, enjoy and dance flamenco with a local flavor. I've taught 2535 Airbnb Guests in 2019 . In 2020, 1627 Guests. More than 857 reviews. You can read more about my in-person experience here: https://www.airbnb.com/ishowu_flamenco-master-dance-class. Say hi, on Instagram, Face or You Tube Channel : Eva Izquierdo de Triana @ishowusevilla

title: Connect with the body in a contemporary dance class
address: Novi Sad, Serbia· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English
act_int: Connect with the body and the ability to express yourself with a dance class, no matter your level. We are going to do a simple training focused on the ability to move the different parts of the body, to the point of being able to improvise a small choreography.At the beginning you will connect with the body using simple and relaxed contemporary dance exercises. Then we move on to the stage of creativity exercises, to strengthen the connection of the creative mind with the body, something common in all good dancers. In the last stage of the lesson we will create a short contemporary choreography, which you can perform with the music of your choice.This is a perfect experience for anyone who wants to improve not only in dance, but also in creating a healthier connection with the body through creativity.
about_author: I'm a dancer, graduated from the Cuban Ballet National School.I have more than 7 years experience in the world of dance working with several companies, specially on ballet and contemporary dance. I have experience teaching children and training professional dancers in classical ballet and contemporary dance. I have worked as a choreographer in contemporary dance pieces, mixing the technique of the academy with the movements of traditional Cuban dances.

title: Rio’s carnival backstage live experience
address: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English, French, and Portuguese
act_int: In our LIVE behind-the-scenes experience of the Rio de Janeiro CarnIval, we are happy to offer families and coworkers from all over the world one hour of fun and exploration of a new culture.Together, we will visit LIVE the hangar where we prepare the costumes and giant floats for the biggest and most famous carnival in the world and at the end of the day, you might find yourself practicing your samba skills  :)Step by step:05min - Host presentation and welcome to the participants.05min - About: Carnival parade, competition, samba school and community.05min - Samba City, giants floats, Carnival costume and preparations for Carnival.05min - About the junior samba school (NGO).05min - Video from last carnival (The last parade of our samba school that won second place in the competition).10min - Carnival tradition - Afro-Brazilian tradition, heritage, Tia Ciata "Mother of Samba" and the first samba15min - Interactive percussion workshop, using homemade instruments such as a frying pan and wooden spoon.05min - Watch part of the last carnival parade of our NGO, the junior samba school, Pimpolhos da Grande Rio and learn more about its socio-educational mission and it's importance in preserving the samba heritage and increasing resilience of our community.05min - Farewell to the participants. See you in Brazil next carnival :)For any doubts, can send a message
about_author: I'm Cinthia, I'm 27 years old and by now I call the City of Samba my home. To be more specifically the warehouse of the Samba School Acadêmicos do Grande Rio in Rio de Janeiro.I was born in a Favela Called Vila Operaria, in the City where Grande Rio belong to Duque de Caxias, so I'was able to part of the social project supported by the youth samba school Pimpolhos da Grande Rio since I was 9. Through this project I got the chance to learn other langue, music, dance and getting more prepared to face the real life. Before the pandemic of Corona Virus I used to work as a tour guide of the Carnaval Experience receiving hundreds of people per year sharing with them the magical history, showing the behind scenes of the biggest open air show on Earth, the Rio de Janeiro's Carnival.  Now I can keep open the doors of my sweet home for you guys.

title: Unique Spiced Drinks with Dancing Indian Chef
address: Berlin, Germany· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English
act_int: Your beloved Dancing Chef is bringing you amazing spiced drinks. Get into the festive mood and embrace the cozy  with these unique spiced drinks. We will blend this experience of spices with jazzy dance moves which will add an extra layer of fun & frolic. The right beats & easy to learn dance moves will inspire you to shake it up & move your body.The event is Great for Groups and Team Building (you can request a date & time at your convenience).You can choose up to 3 drinks that you would like to make :1.Turmeric Latte ( A golden drink hitting all the perfect nodes of winter spices.2.Nuts Got Stained (A dessert in your cup with the right hints of species & with the color of saffron)3. Peanut - Coffee Celebration ( Peanut butter, coffee and lovely vanilla coming together to warm up your winters)4. Beetroot Warmth ( Coziness served in a red velvety warm latte)5. Mulled Wine ( The perfect spiced booze in your mug )6. Mulled Apple cider or Apple Juice. ( The love of winter spices blending with Apple )7. Apple Pie in a Cup ( A warm apple pie served in your mug)8. Christmas Spiced Hot Chocolate ( Spicing up the chocolate will be perfect for this season)9. Chai Masala ( aromatic black tea with spices & ginger  infused )10. Sunny Almonds ( almonds getting yellow with spices)We make Ghee in this experience, it will be back soon.
about_author: I am Nistha, the founder of The Kitty Party in Berlin which organizes food & cultural events. I come from the north of India where I learned the skills to use spices from my mother & grandma. I am a regular reader & blogger. Spices are fascinating to me.My passion is to simplify Indian cooking & its ingredients. Here, I am distilling all my knowledge in a format that is going to be fun, engaging & widely useful. Over the last 7 years, I  have hosted countless events across countries for individuals, families, teams for MIT, Amazon, Facebook, LinkedIn, Capital one, HP, Allbirds, WWP, Expedia, Coinbase, Govt. of Korea, KLA, Lyft, Iconosquare, Care.com, Unv. of Georgetown, Unv. of San Diego, Merck Grp, progressive insurance, Delivery hero & many more.  you can connect with me on Instagram: kittyparty_spiceitup or www.kittyparty.de

title: Balinese Dance and Culture Class
address: Semarapura, Indonesia· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English, French, Italian, and Portuguese
act_int: This experience is open for everyone, you don't need any dance background. Check out my reviews! Great for corporate teams, families, solo travelers & parties!If you can’t find the date or time you want,  don't hesitate to write me! We will open our class with a quick meditation, as an offer and respect for the Balinese culture. After, I will give you a 15 mn introduction about Bali's dances and how the dance is deeply woven within its culture. I will talk about how spirituality influences the day by day of the island and its art, how dance is introduced at a very young age to kids. Then, I will dance for you a small part from the “Condong” dance and we will study together, for 40 mn, few Balinese dance techniques, such as the asymmetrical movements from the hips, legs, torso, feet, arms, hands (mudras) and eyes, and how the dance provides our body with a special energy, connecting the dancer with the material and spiritual world. You will be able to ask me any questions you might have.This is a great way to exercise, to work on your spirituality and relax your mind and body in a different, creative, energetic, empowering & entertaining way. The Balinese culture is very interesting and enjoyable!I also host another Bali experience, where we travel to different places in the island, through beautiful videos. Check it out and book a session in: https://abnb.me/7XSHtHN40mb
about_author: I am an actress, dancer, performer and singer who travel around the world doing art (for almost 20 years now). I have a Master degree in acting at East 15 Acting School, in London and in 2015 I got a scholarship to study Balinese traditional dance-theatre in Bali, Indonesia. I've been working with Balinese art for 7 years now and I mix it with my own art too. I am completely in love with this beautiful culture who welcome me with open hart and thought me so much, including about myself. I am also the creator of RangdArt, a theatre company that works with ritual activist art.

title: Irish Dance Masterclass
address: Galway, Ireland· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English and Czech
act_int: In this online experience, I’ll welcome you virtually into my home in Galway, Ireland.We will spend first few minutes informally chatting and getting to know each other. Then we'll gently warm up our feet.  I'll talk a bit about the different styles of Irish dance and point out the characteristics of the two styles we'll be learning.Then it's time for the dancing! We'll learn a Sean-nós dance step and an Irish step dance step. We'll try the steps to the music. According to how much time is left, we can learn more complicated steps. After that, I can explain how to create your own step out of the movements we just learned.  You will leave this experience with two short sequences of steps.This experience is great for groups and team-building!PLEASE DON'T HESITATE TO CONTACT ME FOR DIFFERENT DATES AND TIMES THAN STATED IN THE CALENDAR! This is an online experience, so you will need access to the internet and a computer, tablet or smartphone. Your camera and microphone has to be functional for this experience since we will be conversing during the experience and I also need to be able to see you so I can help you with the steps. Also please make sure there's enough light in the space where you'll be dancing.Please take a look at my two other Airbnb Experiences here:https://www.airbnb.ie/experiences/125274 https://www.airbnb.ie/experiences/548641Other things to note- ALTERNATIVE TIMES CAN BE ACCOMODATED- SUITABLE FOR LARGE GROUPS, TEAM BUILDING EVENTS- GREAT AS A BIRTHDAY PRESENT OR A SURPRISE FOR A BIRTHDAY PARTY CELEBRATIONIf you have any inquires please don't hesitate to contact me.
about_author: I'm a professional freelance dancer, musician, and educator who loves teaching. I taught workshops at the world's largest Celtic music festival (Celtic Connections), worked with the world-renowned Irish band Kíla, and toured Europe and US.I've hosted in-person Airbnb dance experiences in my home here in Ireland for past 2 years. They're among the most popular experiences in Galway. I believe dance is a powerful tool for human expression that can improve people's mental health and happiness. I’d like to use dance as a platform to bring together people of various social backgrounds and nationalities.Learning dance in my late teens, I still remember how it feels in the beginning! So come relax, learn, dance, and enjoy yourselves!

title: Teams making Curry with Dancing Indian Chef
address: Berlin, Germany· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English
act_int: Are you looking forward to making a delicious curry with your team? Then join me to make the most popular Indian curry - Butter masala in authentic style with your team & dance to the Indian beats while cooking. Trust me, once you have the taste of this curry, you will skip your favorite Indian restaurant & prepare this curry all the time with your friends and family. Microsoft, Amazon, Facebook, SAP, HP & many other companies have joined this event & gave us 5 stars for this curry on my other event called Spice It Up with Dancing Indian Chef. Butter masala is a nutty creamy curry that you can make with your team to have the perfect time together. We will make the curry with scratch & explore all the subtle nuances that will make all the differences.This event is about:* Simple ingredients that can be found anywhere easily.* Suitable for vegan, nut free, vegetarians & meat eaters.* A total fun event, we dance & enjoy the music as we cook.* Explanation of all the spices that we will use.* Perfect for small or large groups.* Not a regular cooking class, it will be a cooking party.Or, You can Design your event by choosing:1. Green Rice, Cashew Rice, Turmeric Rice or Tomato Rice.2. Chickpea with spinach, Peanut butter potatoes, Peas- Potatoes or Cumin Potatoes3.Cucumber yogurt, spinach yogurt,  Spiced yogurt or Garlic yogurt.Ask for Desserts & Drink options.
about_author: I am Nistha, the founder of The Kitty Party in Berlin which organizes food & cultural events. I come from the north of India where I learned the skills to use spices from my mother & grandma. I am a regular reader & blogger. Spices are fascinating to me.My passion is to simplify Indian cooking & its ingredients. Here, I am distilling all my knowledge in a format that is going to be fun, engaging & widely useful. Over the last 7 years, I  have hosted countless events across countries for individuals, families, teams for MIT, Amazon, Facebook, LinkedIn, Capital one, HP, Allbirds, WWP, Expedia, Coinbase, Govt. of Korea, KLA, Lyft, Iconosquare, Care.com, Unv. of Georgetown, Unv. of San Diego, Merck Grp, progressive insurance, Delivery hero & many more.  you can connect with me on Instagram: kittyparty_spiceitup or www.kittyparty.de

title: Learn to Chair Dance from home
address: Paris, France· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English and French
act_int: In the privacy of your own home you can discover the fun workout of Chair dancing. We start the lesson with a warm up routine and continue on to learn a dance routine using the chair.  We will finish the lesson with a cool down.This activity is for all fitness levels and is so much fun you won’t even realise you are working out.
about_author: My name is Suzanne and I am a chair dance instructor and have been teaching chair dancing for 3 years. I started learning 4 years ago and instantly knew I had discovered a new passion from my very first class.I am from New Zealand but have been living in France for over 15 years and consider both countries my home.

title: Super Fun Dance Classes for Couples
address: Tbilisi, Georgia· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 45 mins · Hosted in English, Georgian, Polish, and Russian
act_int: Dance classes for the couples, ladies, as well as inclusive classes for wheelchair users. Get the chance to learn these dances from the professional choreographer: Social Latin (salsa, bachata), Slow Waltz, Tango, Foxtrot, Samba, Rumba, Cha-cha-cha, Rock n Roll (Jive), Paso Doble, Hip-Hop, Reggaeton, Afro, Contemporary, Improvisation, Wheelchair Dance. The class is for the beginner couples, who have never danced before, have little experience, or intermediate couples, who want to work on a more complicated technique, as well as choreography.  Class starts with 5-10 minute warmup, basic part is for the learning steps and technique; the last part 5 minutes is for the stretching and cool down. If one or both of the partners are wheelchair users, we will have the chance to learn unique techniques of wheelchair dance and some choreographies that can be done together and separately.I will make sure that by the end of the session you have taken all the knowledge about the material we learned to practice at home, that you feel confident and more connected to each other, you feel happy and free. The most important to me is, that my students get maximum out of the session and have fun at the same time.
about_author: Hey, guys! I believe this is a unique experience for couples, ladies and people with disabilities, who like to move and try new things. I am a professional Ballroom dancer, certified inclusive dance trainer and fitness instructor. I worked in Paralympic Committee of Georgia as a wheelchair dance coach for 4+yrs. I am the founder of Georgian National Wheelchair Dance Sport Federation and Tbilisi Inclusive Dance  Co. I love what I do and I work with dancers and students of all backgrounds for more than 15yrs.  Back in 2015 my partner and I won Georgia's Got Talent Show with our wheelchair dance. I am also  certified ZUMBA fitness trainer, Latin and hip-hop dancer, contemporary and modern dance. We will have a lot of fun, no dance experience needed. We can experiment and dance any style you want. Most important is to have fun while learning.

title: Discover Japanese Obon stories and festivals in summer
address: 羽生市, Japan· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English and Japanese
act_int: Let's get prepared for your future trip to Japan!This is a new & fun way to experience Japanese festivals and culture.Before covid-19, I traveled all around Japan.My customers especially love/are big fans of Japanese festivals, so I love taking them to enjoy these! But I think if you know why we dance and hold these summer festivals, you will be able to enjoy them more.I will show you the popular Japanese summer festivals (we call those Obon festivals), origins of Obon, Obon customs, and some handy tips to enjoy the summer festivals (Obon festivals) like locals/as if you were a local by using pre-recorded videos, photos, and some quizzes along the way.Keiko will be your virtual tour guide.Content1. What Obon is.    I will show what Japanese people do in the Obon     holiday around mid-Aug.2. Obon story   You will know more about unique and vibrant Japanese    customs through storytelling.3. Obon customs    I will show what we do by using pre-recorded videos.4. Let's dance a Bon dance.   My partners and I will show you how to dance. If you    would like to join, let's dance together or just watching    us dance is enjoyable.   It is very easy, so people of all ages enjoy Bon dance in   Japan.Join us and experience the Land of the Rising Sun like never before!
about_author: I’m a professional tour guide, providing unique and engaging tours of Japan and all our country has to offer.I travel all around Japan as a tour guide. My customers especially love Japanese festivals, so I love taking them to enjoy these!Since I travel all around Japan, I can introduce many different Japanese festivals to you. Also, I love festivals especially the ones in my hometown. My family members carry the  Mikoshi in the festivals every summer…

title: Joytime - Dance Improvisation
address: New York, United States· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English
act_int: Do you love to dance but don’t consider yourself a professional? Are you seeking to deepen your body-awareness? Are you wanting to increase your energy and burn calories but dread the idea of exercise which feels chore-like? As a professional dancer, movement has kept me fit while providing me with joy and meaning. Most sessions are privates for individuals, pairs or groups in the same space or at a distance. While each participant will be exploring their own body and choice-making, the social aspect provides added value and enjoyment. We’ll warm up the body through a guided and flowing improvisation. I’ll explain the difference between prescriptive movement versus descriptive movement and offer tools for exploring new ways of perceiving space, time and energy to enliven your dancing. I oftentimes offer a "score" which is a structure for integrating the vocabulary and tools I've shared. My goal is to remind you that you are 3-dimensional so while this class is virtual it is designed for minimal screen orientation and maximum play. This class can be adapted for any age and ability, a family gathering or corporate engagement. Get out of your head and into your body. I strive to create a supportive environment to explore because as New York Times bestselling author Brené Brown acknowledges, there is no joy without vulnerability. Don't see the time you want? Just ask.
about_author: I’m an award-winning choreographer who has been making and performing dance for over 18 years. I teach improvisation for Movement Research, based in NYC, one of the world’s leading laboratories for the investigation of dance and movement-based forms. I’ve been described by the press as inventive, mesmerizing, and a gifted comedian :) and have performed in the Netherlands, Japan, Singapore, Hungary, India, Russia, across the USA.  I created the viral video “So You Think You Can’t Understand Contemporary Dance?,” a two-minute conversation with a five-year-old where we explain some key principles. Many of my performances incorporate amateur dances and  I love helping people connect to their bodies and discover the delight of improvisation.Check out my other popular experience, Restorative Contact: https://www.airbnb.com/experiences/1698043

title: Gypsy Flamenco Fiesta & Dance Lesson
address: Seville, Spain· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English, Spanish, and Italian
act_int: This is a beginners class for all! The aim is to have fun, learn the basic movements, the important social etiquette of flamenco and a short flamenco routine. You’ll be ready to dance at any party like a local! I’ll first share interesting tales about the beautiful and mysterious culture, the art and lifestyle. See how we really do live flamenco here in Seville. There is no other way to delve so deep into this world - apart from living here for 20 years! Then, to dance! Learn about important posture, energy and attitude, rhythms and clappings, hand and arm movements and key party steps. We will also do a «remate», this is a rhythmical response to singing that is sure to impress!Your short fiesta routine includes:Entering the dance floor in style,Step and hand movements to make you look like a local, The «remate», And of course, the classy exit. In a typical fiesta we do short dances so that everyone can participate. Meanwhile, others clap and encourage dancers with «jaleos» like "olé!". To outsiders it sounds like heckling, to us it’s the best energy there is - you’ll learn more! After the class we'll have time to go over any questions you have. I will also send you the best souvenirs to help you keep dancing! - A video of what you have just learnt- A unique footwork tutorial and,- Two personal playlists of the best traditional and modern flamenco musicOther things to note- This is a fun lesson for everyone and no knowledge of flamenco or dance is needed - You need a reliable wifi connection
about_author: "The gypsy roots of flamenco run in my blood", says Kati, our Finish born flamenco artist. "My life is 100% flamenco," says Costanza originally from the green hills of Tuscany. Born in different countries we moved to Spain years ago. The reason? Flamenco. We love it and we live it! There is not a day we don’t dance, clap the rhythms  (las palmas... I'll explain more!) and of course, fiesta. We have danced and taught in 20 countries, across Spain, the deserts of Morocco and islands of the Pacific. Kati's husband composes flamenco guitar & comes from a gypsy family-you might spot him! Often, you can find Costanza dancing like a gypsy on Seville's streets.Before Corona, we used to host people at our flamenco venue in Seville and enjoy tapas. Now, let us invite you to a small flamenco fiesta in our house & celebrate this mysterious music.
author_name: Meet your Host, Mahsa, Kati, Maria & Co

title: A bailar salsa cubanapasos libres
address: Turku, Finland· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English and Spanish
act_int: Primeramente presentaremos todos los participantes de la clase  para q surga un ambiente cómodo y que  todo fluya con total naturalidad. A continuacion realizaremos un breve calentamiento: cabeza, tronco y extremidades  para alistar al cuerpo antes de comenzar a bailar. Estaremos aprendiendo los principales pasos basicos de SALSA-CASINO aumentando asi su complejidad en la practica.Usaremos estilos de distintos generos danzarios cubanos los cuales se mezclaran en los pasos libres de salsa-casino. En la marcha aumentaremos su complejidad y movimientos corporales. Moveras el cuerpo siguiendo el compás de una pista musical!.AL finalizar la clase tendremos como resultado  una pequeña  y divertida coreografía . Estaremos activos todo el tiempo durante la experiencia. Segura estoy que mi experiencia le aportara  mucho conocimiento acerca  de la cultura cubana y sobre todo nuevas amistades.         No pasa nada si tienes alguna nocion de baile o es primera vez que intentas bailar.La idea principal es disfrutar al maximo sin importar que nivel de baile tengas! Me  apasiona poder mostar y compartir mi cultura con otros.Atrevete a vivirlo!!!!
about_author: Desde pequeña ha sido mi profesion bailar e impartir clases de bailes.Llevo mas de 25 años de experiencia y vida artistica. He impartido  talleres de bailes cubanos  y afro cubanos tanto  nacional  como  internacionalmente. Graduada de la Escuela Nacional de Arte Cubana .He trabajado en distintas e importantes compañias danzarias cubanas. Amo la musica, el baile es indiscutiblemente mi pasion!

title: Discover indigenous New Zealand with Māori Merv
address: Whangārei, New Zealand· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English
act_int: Be prepared to open your mind to the incredible feats of the indigenous people of Aotearoa New Zealand. You may know us as the Māori.We welcome you on an intimate journey with our family as we share the real insight into our people and culture that makes New Zealand so special and unique.Prepare yourself for a high energy interactive virtual experience hosted live from our home in Northland, New Zealand.Our warrior, Māori Merv will bring our amazing history to life and leave you spellbound by the incredible feats of our ancestors like Maui, who you can thank for fishing up this beautiful country and slowing the sun (just to name a few)  Be mesmerized by the customs and traditions that make Māori culture so unique.  Participate in the awe-inspiring Powhiri - welcoming ceremony, learn a new language,  sing along with us as we share our culture.  Witness and feel the spirit and power of the mighty Haka, as done by our rugby world champions, the All Blacks.This is an experience of a life time and the best introduction to New Zealand.  If it's not on your bucket list yet, it will be.Please message us to schedule your event or if the time you would like is not on the schedule. Individual bookings and educational groups welcome.
about_author: Kia ora!  Hello!We are husband and wife team, happily married for nearly 30 years and have the scars to prove it.  Five children from 8 to 16 years that is.We are indigneous to New Zealand, both born and bred in our tribal areas of Te Taitokerau Northland. (the top of New Zealand, also the warmest)Up until covid hit our shores, we were hosting visitors from around the world into our home for a very special and personal experience soaked within our culture.  We love meeting people and sharing our world, Te Ao Māori – The Māori world view which is steeped in knowledge and tradition.  The wellbeing of our family, our communities, our environment is at the forefront.Aotearoa New Zealand showcases some of the most beautiful coastlines and landscapes in the world, wait till you meet the beautiful indigenous people that go with it.
author_name: Meet your Host, Mervyn And Rangimarie

title: The body which speaks
address: Белград, Serbia· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 90 mins · Hosted in English and Russian
act_int: We begin with warming up our bodies. Then we continue with guided dance improvisation. Our flow is our meditation. During the process, we are going to find a new language - a language of our body. What does it say to us? We are going to learn how to find and release energy blocks. We are going to unleash inner potential, get rid of stress, and enjoy the moment. Thereby we are opening new possibilities for therapeutic change through dance.Moreover, we are developing creativity through movement. You will have an opportunity to be a creator. Plus, movement practice is a good tool to stay fit! At the end of the class, we will do exercises to stretch muscles.Don't be scared if you've never tried it. This practice includes basic moves which are available even for a beginner.
about_author: I'm passionate about researching body and mind connections. Being an experienced dancer and professional yoga teacher I help people to heal themselves through movement.My expertise includes 10 years of Russian classical ensemble, 2 years of show ballet, 4 years in University hip-hop team, being a dance teacher for 5 years, being a choreographer of 4 international performances, 6 years of teaching yoga.I'm looking forward to sharing my knowledge, assisting people in releasing stress, feeling free, and inspired.

title: Dance the ‘stress’ away
address: Lisboa, Portugal· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in Portuguese and English
act_int: Let's Dance!!We're going through hard times, and we can't go out and celebrate a good night of dancing with our friends... However, that doesn't mean we can't have fun and shake bad energies away at home! On a cloudy morning or at a beautiful sunset, in this class, you can dance and feel happier instantly. You'll need zero experience to dance with me but is mandatory to bring good energy and a big smile, then you just have to "hear it, feel it and shake it away".I promise an hour full of hip hop beats, Latin roots, and African rhythms. And a lot of sweat too.Just connect zoom on your PC or phone, and we're good to go. You can do the class by yourself or accompanied by friends or family.This class is suitable for ages 5 to 100.
about_author: Hi, I'm Marta and I'm 28 years old.Since I was a kid I always have an interest in sports and dance.When I was 14 I join a hip hop crew and my love for dance just went skyrocket high. From that point on I studied and lived for dance practices and dance competitions.I'm a street dance teacher since I'm 18 and my biggest accomplishment was to be able to have my students compete twice at a Worldwide Championship at Leiden, Netherlands. We also have performed at TV shows, as backup dancers, and even at wedding receptions.I'm passionate about kids and all that dance could teach them and I teach classes every day to ages from 3 to 60 years old.There's a lot you can say about my work, but the biggest reward is seeing people leave the dance classes with a smile on theirs faces.I love my job and hope I can share some of that love with you too

title: Brazilian Samba class
address: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in Portuguese, English, Spanish, and French
act_int: Samba is one of the most famous dances in Brazil and Rio de Janeiro is the birthplace of Samba. In this class, we'll start with a little warm-up and get to know each other. I'll tell you all about my love story with samba and how I became a teacher. Then, I will teach you step-by-step how to samba, in a fun and light class. You will feel at the Rio de Janeiro Carnival!Feel free to book in groups, with your family or friends and feel a little of the carnival of our wonderful city.
about_author: We are samba teachers and the winning school of the Rio de Janeiro carnival 2020. We have already taught samba in several countries, we guarantee that this online class will be very fun.

title: Conditioning with Capoeira (Special Carnival Edition)
address: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in Portuguese, English, Spanish, and Italian
act_int: Special Carnival Edition for all sessions in February!  During this special edition, before conditioning for our class, I'll go through some Samba rhythms and movements.  I will show you how this connects to the Capoeira roots. As dance conditioning, we will exercise our motor coordination with basic and relaxed movements. I will show you the basic steps in capoeira and we will work on a simple sequence together. We will take a break to give you a tour through the instruments and  to show you how to play capoeira rhythms. Putting all of this together we will practice the blend of dance and fight that is called “jogo de capoeira”. Expect a moderate to intense workout as we adapt the movements to your body.Great for a group dance/workout session! I can also adapt the class for children. Contact me if you would like to book for dates not on the calendar.Other things to noteThe only preparation you need to enjoy this experience is to set up a space in your living room or bedroom. It needs to be large enough to stand with your arms wide out and turn in a circle. A shaded outdoors spot also works well. Set up your camera so that I can see you to fix your movements.
about_author: Hello! I am Marcelo, known in the Capoeira world as Professor Marcelo Medusa. I am from Rio de Janeiro, a city with strong Brazilian culture. Rio is one of the centers of Capoeira, an art which blends together dance, music and martial arts. Capoeira was developed by the West Africans that were enslaved in Brazil as disguised combat training, mixing West African, Indigenous and Portuguese cultures. In capoeira, we play music based on percussion instruments like the berimbau, atabaque and pandeiro while two capoeiristas “play” in combat.I have worked with capoeira for 30 years. I have students local to Rio as well as students from other cities and countries. I started an online training practice two years ago via WhatsApp, Facebook and Zoom.  I want to use my experience to help people move in a fun, dynamic and safe practice.

Then, its times to get started. Marcelo introduces you to some easy moves to build up your confidence. Each sequence builds on the previous sequence. Initially, it can take a little time to get all the moves in the right sequence. I'm sure my efforts were fairly unimpressive though Marcelo really does make you feel at ease and kept encouraging me nonetheless. title: Tango Through the History of Argentina
address: san telmo, Argentina· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins · Hosted in English, Spanish, and Portuguese
act_int: Let’s tango together! You can do this from home and don’t need any prior experience or specific clothing. Tango is a feeling that you carry within you and it connects you with other people. Over an hour you will discover how to feel the music and bring it into your body. You will learn the rules of the "game" and how to enjoy playing at home. Your dance level doesn't matter !!! Whether you are a beginner or advanced, the rules will change so that the game never ends.In this way you will understand how two bodies can merge into one to move together and connect, without thinking about anything, as if it were a therapy.We will also discuss how tango was born, as it is relevant to what is happening in today's world.We’ll also discuss how tango was born, as it’s relevant to what’s happening in today’s world. great for groups, great for team-building.Contact me for a new date or private session.You can read 400+ reviews for my other tango experience here:https://www.airbnb.com.ar/experiences/155814
about_author: I'm a Spanish tango dancer who lives in Buenos Aires. For the past couple years, I’ve been sharing my passion for dance with people from all around the world through different Airbnb Experiences: https://www.airbnb.com/users/show/149156312. After leaving the corporate world to pursue my love of tango, I’m happy transmitting the beautiful feeling of improvised dance and helping people discover this wonderful world. It is the best gift that tango has given me. What makes me happiest is when I hear, “Manuel...as soon as I can travel, I will come to visit you to go dancing together.” That is when I know my mission has been completed.

title: Afro-Peruvian Dances and Live Music
address: Lima, Peru· Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 75 mins · Hosted in Spanish and English
act_int: In this online experience we want to share with you our Afro-Peruvian dances and rhythms.You will learn the most used dance steps in the Festejo, one of the most representative dances of the Afro-Peruvian culture. Then we will continue dancing Zamacueca !, another dance that is characterized by the use of scarves. And with the steps learned we will do together a dance sequence that you can then continue practicing at home.You will also enjoy LIVE musical intermissions! with Afro-Peruvian music and its different rhythms where we will play some Afro-Peruvian instruments such as the Peruvian cajón, the cajita, the jaw and the bell.We want to transmit all the Afro-Peruvian energy to you through dance, music, anecdotes and a family atmosphere and camaraderie as well as our families transmitted the culture to us and how we did it in another experience on Airbnb that you can review here: https: // www .airbnb.com.pe / experiences / 1258352You will learn, live and enjoy a magical and festive Afro-Peruvian experience from the comfort of your home.
about_author: Hello, I am Milagros (Mila) and I am a teacher of folkloric dances, graduated from the Jose Maria Arguedas National Superior School of Folklore. I have 10 years of experience and I have belonged to various folk groups with which I have danced throughout Peru and I have taught in different schools in Lima and state institutions. I am currently the director of Danzaria Peru, a dance studio focused on the dissemination of Peruvian folk dances through workshops for young people, adults, seniors, people with disabilities and anyone who wants to know, learn and enjoy different rhythms of the coast, mountains and jungle of Peru, as well as improving their physical and emotional health through art.We are accompanied by Ruth, a musician with 10 years of experience spreading the music of the Peruvian coast as a guitarist and percussionist.
comment_all: [{'time': 'November 2021', 'name': 'Yasmine', 'comment': 'I really loved this experience, it was excellent, I had a lot of fun and I have discovered a lot about Afro-Peruvian culture, history and music.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'November 2021', 'name': 'Kathrin', 'comment': 'We had the best time with Mila and Ruth. They shared so much about their culture and background and their passion for what they do was amazing!', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'November 2021', 'name': 'Steffany', 'comment': 'What an incredibly joyous experience with Mila and Ruth. These two ladies are filled with energy, pride, humor, and talent. My friend and I learned about the contributions of Africans in Peru through food and music. Mila performed many dances while Ruth played a variety of instruments. Then Ruth was kind enough to play the guitar and sing some beautiful songs. I’m surprised there aren’t more reviews but I truly hope that changes. Typically Afro Peruvian music is played by men so it was fascinating to see women being represented and representing', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'September 2021', 'name': 'Melody', 'comment': 'Ruth and Milagros were so sweet and thoughtful! They even sang happy birthday to me with a national birthday serenade song. I pray blessings over them both.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'March 2021', 'name': 'LaMone', 'comment': 'OMG so much fun!! I booked this as a private group experience for my birthday. \xa0Mila and Ruth were great.  It was such a wonderful personalized experience.  They decorated their room for me with birthday decorations, sung happy birthday to me, and  recorded and sent me a copy of the happy video.  They were so engaging and knowledgeable.  We loved both the dance and live music performances.  It was so great to be introduced to the Afro-Peruvian culture.  Thank you so much for making my birthday awesome!', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'March 2021', 'name': 'Marlina', 'comment': "We thoroughly enjoyed our experience with Mila and ruth. We had family join from all over the world in various time zones, and Mila and Ruth took the effort to really personalize this experience for us. We celebrated my husband's birthday by joining the experience.
